code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{StoreContext}from"../context/StoreContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function CartPage(){const{cart,checkout}=useContext(StoreContext);const total=cart.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+item.price*item.quantity,0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container my-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Shopping Cart"}),cart.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-muted",children:"Your cart is empty."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:cart.map((product,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card mb-4 shadow-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.thumbnail,className:"card-img-top",alt:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["$",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Quantity: ",product.quantity]})]})]})},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Total: $",total.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success",onClick:checkout,children:"Checkout"})]})]});}
